questiontext.text:
The medical faculty of the VU conducts a study into the effectiveness of a product that should lead to weight reduction. For this purpose, the weight (in kilograms) for the use of the product is compared with the weight in a group of 20 people after the product has been used for three weeks by the persons examined.

Why should the Independent t-test not be used for this analysis?

generalfeedback.text:
Because it are the same people the sample is not independent.
The two samples that are compared are the same persons, so they are not independent of each other.
